attributes.action: order Mr Speaker to change the rules, immediately, so that (dis)honourable members can no longer submit their food bills for payment by the claims office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For already vastly overpaid MPs to be able to claim for their food to be paid for is an abomination, while there are thousands of people who are suffering hardship because their punitive tax payments are taken at source to be used, at will, by our politicians who may vote these benefits for themselves with impunity.  This disgusting activity by our (dis)honourable representatives MUST be stopped and it MUST be stopped IMMEDIATELY.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
